content.p: The Library is responsible for managing information resources for learning, teaching and research and providing support on their use. The library is proactive in developing a wide range of electronic resources and in promoting and guiding the use of information resources, including: For help, contact us: Customer Services Counter: +6 (03) 8924 8318 Reference Desk : +6 (03) 8924 8319 eLibrary help form Follow us: Please see our contact page for telephone and email contact points.
